   179‚Üí        'sanitize_callback' => 'sanitize_textarea_field',

   203‚Üí// Security enhancements
   204‚Üífunction tregnar_saas_security() {
   205‚Üí    // Remove WordPress version from head
   206‚Üí    remove_action('wp_head', 'wp_generator');
   207‚Üí    
   208‚Üí    // Hide login errors
   209‚Üí    add_filter('login_errors', function() {
   210‚Üí        return 'Invalid login credentials.';
   211‚Üí    });
   212‚Üí    
   213‚Üí    // Disable file editing in admin
   214‚Üí    if (!defined('DISALLOW_FILE_EDIT')) {
   215‚Üí        define('DISALLOW_FILE_EDIT', true);
   216‚Üí    }
   217‚Üí}
   218‚Üíadd_action('init', 'tregnar_saas_security');
   219‚Üí
   220‚Üí// Performance optimizations
   221‚Üífunction tregnar_saas_performance() {
   222‚Üí    // Remove unnecessary WordPress features
   223‚Üí    remove_action('wp_head', 'rsd_link');
   224‚Üí    remove_action('wp_head', 'wlwmanifest_link');
   225‚Üí    remove_action('wp_head', 'wp_shortlink_wp_head');
   226‚Üí    remove_action('wp_head', 'rest_output_link_wp_head');
   227‚Üí    remove_action('wp_head', 'wp_oembed_add_discovery_links');
   228‚Üí    remove_action('template_redirect', 'rest_output_link_header', 11);
   229‚Üí    
   230‚Üí    // Disable emojis
   231‚Üí    remove_action('wp_head', 'print_emoji_detection_script', 7);
   232‚Üí    remove_action('wp_print_styles', 'print_emoji_styles');
   233‚Üí    remove_action('admin_print_scripts', 'print_emoji_detection_script');
   234‚Üí    remove_action('admin_print_styles', 'print_emoji_styles');
   235‚Üí}
   236‚Üíadd_action('init', 'tregnar_saas_performance');

   320‚Üí// Create default pages on theme activation
   321‚Üífunction tregnar_create_default_pages() {
   322‚Üí    // Create Homepage
   323‚Üí    $homepage = get_page_by_title('Home');
   324‚Üí    if (!$homepage) {
   325‚Üí        $homepage_content = tregnar_get_homepage_content();
   326‚Üí        $home_id = wp_insert_post(array(
   327‚Üí            'post_title' => 'Home',
   328‚Üí            'post_name' => 'home',
   329‚Üí            'post_content' => $homepage_content,
   330‚Üí            'post_status' => 'publish',
   331‚Üí            'post_type' => 'page'
   332‚Üí        ));
   333‚Üí        
   334‚Üí        if (!is_wp_error($home_id)) {
   335‚Üí            // Set as static homepage
   336‚Üí            update_option('show_on_front', 'page');
   337‚Üí            update_option('page_on_front', $home_id);
   338‚Üí        }
   339‚Üí    }
   340‚Üí    
   341‚Üí    // Create Signup page
   342‚Üí    $signup_page = get_page_by_title('Signup');
   343‚Üí    if (!$signup_page) {
   344‚Üí        $signup_content = tregnar_get_signup_content();
   345‚Üí        $signup_id = wp_insert_post(array(
   346‚Üí            'post_title' => 'Signup',
   347‚Üí            'post_name' => 'signup',
   348‚Üí            'post_content' => $signup_content,
   349‚Üí            'post_status' => 'publish',
   350‚Üí            'post_type' => 'page'
   351‚Üí        ));
   352‚Üí    }
   353‚Üí    
   354‚Üí    // Create Pricing Table page
   355‚Üí    $pricing_page = get_page_by_title('Pricing Table');
   356‚Üí    if (!$pricing_page) {
   357‚Üí        $pricing_content = tregnar_get_pricing_table_content();
   358‚Üí        $pricing_id = wp_insert_post(array(
   359‚Üí            'post_title' => 'Pricing Table',
   360‚Üí            'post_name' => 'pricing-table',
   361‚Üí            'post_content' => $pricing_content,
   362‚Üí            'post_status' => 'publish',
   363‚Üí            'post_type' => 'page'
   364‚Üí        ));
   365‚Üí    }
   366‚Üí}
   367‚Üíadd_action('after_switch_theme', 'tregnar_create_default_pages');
   368‚Üí
   369‚Üí// Force create pages (run this manually if needed)
   370‚Üífunction tregnar_force_create_pages() {
   371‚Üí    // Delete existing pages first
   372‚Üí    $pages_to_delete = ['Home', 'Signup', 'Pricing Table'];
   373‚Üí    foreach ($pages_to_delete as $page_title) {
   374‚Üí        $page = get_page_by_title($page_title);
   375‚Üí        if ($page) {
   376‚Üí            wp_delete_post($page->ID, true);
   377‚Üí        }
   378‚Üí    }
   379‚Üí    
   380‚Üí    // Create new pages
   381‚Üí    tregnar_create_default_pages();
   382‚Üí}
   383‚Üí
   384‚Üí// Add admin function to manually trigger page creation
   385‚Üífunction tregnar_add_manual_page_creation() {
   386‚Üí    if (isset($_GET['create_tregnar_pages']) && $_GET['create_tregnar_pages'] === 'now' && current_user_can('manage_options')) {
   387‚Üí        tregnar_force_create_pages();
   388‚Üí        wp_redirect(admin_url('edit.php?post_type=page&tregnar_pages_created=1'));
   389‚Üí        exit;
   390‚Üí    }
   391‚Üí    
   392‚Üí    if (isset($_GET['tregnar_pages_created']) && $_GET['tregnar_pages_created'] === '1') {
   393‚Üí        add_action('admin_notices', function() {
   394‚Üí            echo '<div class="notice notice-success is-dismissible"><p>Tregnar pages have been created/updated successfully!</p></div>';
   395‚Üí        });
   396‚Üí    }
   397‚Üí}
   398‚Üíadd_action('admin_init', 'tregnar_add_manual_page_creation');
   399‚Üí
   400‚Üí// Add shortcodes for dynamic content
   401‚Üífunction tregnar_pricing_plans_shortcode($atts) {
   402‚Üí    $atts = shortcode_atts(array(
   403‚Üí        'style' => 'cards', // 'cards' or 'table'
   404‚Üí    ), $atts, 'pricing_plans');
   405‚Üí    
   406‚Üí    if ($atts['style'] === 'table') {
   407‚Üí        return tregnar_get_pricing_table_full_content();
   408‚Üí    } else {
   409‚Üí        return tregnar_get_signup_full_content();
   410‚Üí    }
   411‚Üí}
   412‚Üíadd_shortcode('pricing_plans', 'tregnar_pricing_plans_shortcode');
   413‚Üí
   414‚Üí// Shortcode for signup URL
   415‚Üífunction tregnar_signup_url_shortcode() {
   416‚Üí    return site_url('/signup');
   417‚Üí}
   418‚Üíadd_shortcode('signup_url', 'tregnar_signup_url_shortcode');
   419‚Üí
   420‚Üí// Generate homepage content
   421‚Üífunction tregnar_get_homepage_content() {
   422‚Üí    ob_start();
   423‚Üí    ?>
   424‚Üí    
   425‚Üí<!-- Hero Section -->
   426‚Üí<section class="hero-section">
   427‚Üí    <div class="hero-container">
   428‚Üí        <div class="hero-content">

   435‚Üí                        <span class="feature-icon">üöÄ</span>

   440‚Üí                        <span>Local market research</span>
   441‚Üí                    </div>
   442‚Üí                    <div class="feature-item">

   444‚Üí                        <span>Reddit scraper & keyword tools</span>
   445‚Üí                    </div>
   446‚Üí                </div>

   449‚Üí                    <a href="[signup_url]" class="cta-primary">Start Free Trial</a>
   450‚Üí                    <a href="#" class="cta-secondary">Watch Demo</a>
   451‚Üí                </div>
   452‚Üí            </div>
   453‚Üí            
   454‚Üí            <div class="hero-video">
   455‚Üí                <div class="video-container">
   456‚Üí                    <div class="video-placeholder">

   734‚Üí<script>
   735‚Üí// Billing toggle functionality
   736‚Üídocument.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
   737‚Üí    const toggle = document.getElementById('billing-toggle');
   738‚Üí    const prices = document.querySelectorAll('.price');
   739‚Üí    const periods = document.querySelectorAll('.period');
   740‚Üí    
   741‚Üí    toggle.addEventListener('change', function() {
   742‚Üí        prices.forEach(price => {
   743‚Üí            const monthly = price.dataset.monthly;
   744‚Üí            const annual = price.dataset.annual;
   745‚Üí            
   746‚Üí            if (toggle.checked) {
   747‚Üí                price.textContent = annual;
   748‚Üí            } else {
   749‚Üí                price.textContent = monthly;
   750‚Üí            }
   751‚Üí        });
   752‚Üí        
   753‚Üí        periods.forEach(period => {
   754‚Üí            if (toggle.checked) {
   755‚Üí                period.textContent = '/month';
   756‚Üí                period.innerHTML = period.textContent + '<small> (billed annually)</small>';
   757‚Üí            } else {
   758‚Üí                period.textContent = '/month';
   759‚Üí            }
   760‚Üí        });
   761‚Üí    });
   762‚Üí});
   763‚Üí</script>
   764‚Üí
   765‚Üí    <?php
   766‚Üí    return ob_get_clean();
   767‚Üí}
   768‚Üí

  1034‚Üífunction tregnar_pricing_admin_page() {
  1035‚Üí    if (isset($_POST['save_pricing'])) {
  1036‚Üí        $pricing = array();
  1037‚Üí        $plans = array('starter', 'professional', 'enterprise');
  1038‚Üí        
  1039‚Üí        foreach ($plans as $plan) {
  1040‚Üí            $pricing[$plan] = array(
  1041‚Üí                'name' => sanitize_text_field($_POST[$plan . '_name']),
  1042‚Üí                'price' => sanitize_text_field($_POST[$plan . '_price']),
  1043‚Üí                'period' => sanitize_text_field($_POST[$plan . '_period']),
  1044‚Üí                'description' => sanitize_text_field($_POST[$plan . '_description']),
  1045‚Üí                'domains_limit' => sanitize_text_field($_POST[$plan . '_domains_limit']),
  1046‚Üí                'monthly_visits' => sanitize_text_field($_POST[$plan . '_monthly_visits']),
  1047‚Üí                'storage' => sanitize_text_field($_POST[$plan . '_storage']),
  1048‚Üí                'support' => sanitize_text_field($_POST[$plan . '_support']),
  1049‚Üí                'api_access' => sanitize_text_field($_POST[$plan . '_api_access']),
  1050‚Üí                'features' => array_map('sanitize_text_field', explode("\n", $_POST[$plan . '_features'])),
  1051‚Üí                'button_text' => sanitize_text_field($_POST[$plan . '_button_text']),
  1052‚Üí                'button_url' => esc_url_raw($_POST[$plan . '_button_url']),

  1059‚Üí    }
  1060‚Üí
